1
OPM Overview
Concept of a Profile
•
A specialisation of an OPM graph for a specific domain or to handle a specific 
problem
•
Note: profile multiplicity challenges inter-operability
•
A profile has a unique identity
•
Defines vocabulary, guidelines,  expansion guidance, serialisation format
speaker: SYSTEM
